articles.author: Courtenay Brown
articles.title: America's blue-collar workforce is shrinking - Axios
articles.description: Trump's policies are hitting the same sectors he vowed to reinvigorate.
articles.content:
By the numbers: The labor market's summer hiring drought was particularly painful for industrial parts of the economy.
<ul><li>The "manufacturing recession" underway for years got uglier. The sector… [+3698 chars]
